name: The Void (itch) (stalking_eclipse)
description:
WASD - Directional Movement

Tab - Toggle rifle

Shift + WASD - Sprint

Esc - Pause

Q - Emergency quit.

Story - nothing is known, nothing is real. On a strange planet where nothing makes sense, clues of something are left behind that may or may not lead to answers, answers to questions didn't even have.
